name: Fancy Pants Pretzel Pizzas
author: Elizabeth
summary: Kick up your Pretzel Crisps® by turning them into perfect little healthy pizza bites! Topped with a mixture of cheese and chicken sausage and carefully wrapped in chives these are sure to impress.
ingredients: ⅛ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1 link sweet Italian chicken sausage, thinly sliced, or more as needed
1 cup pizza sauce, purchased or homemade, heated
directions: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Combine mozzarella, Parmesan, and parsley in a small bowl
Carefully top each crisp with about 1 teaspoon of the mixture
Place pan under broiler; broil until cheese is warm and beginning to melt, about 30 seconds to 1 minute
Watch carefully so they don't burn
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir until sausage is nicely browned on both sides, 1 to 2 minutes
Top the cheese on each Pretzel Crisp® with a piece of sausage
Carefully wrap a chive around the middle of the crisp tying it into a knot
Cut off any excess chive and place on your serving platter
Serve immediately with pizza sauce for dipping
